item.title: Attaching a file in Cordova & uploading it with jQuery Mobile
item.description: This post is for those unlucky souls who are tasked with developing an Android solution that attaches a file to an HTML form using Cordova and uploads the form via jQuery Mobile. Documentation on these topics is scarce so I’ve created a minimal example on my GitHub page demonstrating how to do this. Instructions to run the example are found inside the project’s README file.

item.title: Building ZeroMQ for Android
item.description: This weekend I ran ZeroMQ on the Android platform. The ZeroMQ website gives instructions on how to build ZeroMQ for Android and (surprise, surprise) I got errors following them. At least I wasn’t alone. Fellow blogger Victor was just as lucky as me. He solved these errors, and what’s even better, he created a set of scripts which correctly build ZeroMQ for Android.
